comments: She is a wonderful person and can teach so that everyone understands on ANY level. Yes, she might have a mouth with a few words some might find offensive at times, but that is her personality and makes her real. It is not an act nor a show. She is a LIVE, ACTION, HANDS ON teacher and not everyone can handle this teaching style. Breath of fresh air!
So far not very impressed. She\'s trying to hard to be "cool" Cursing alot during class doesn\'t make you a good instructor. Take time to teach, and stop trying to be cool.
